com.estmob.android.sendanywhere.sdk

Interface Task.OnTaskListener

  • Enclosing class:
    Task

    public static interface Task.OnTaskListener
    The callback interface used to indicate the transfer state has been changed.

    This should be provided to Task.setOnTaskListener(OnTaskListener).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onNotify(int state, int detailedState, java.lang.Object obj)
      Called when the transfer status has been changed.

    • Method Detail

      • onNotify

        void onNotify(int state,
              int detailedState,
              java.lang.Object obj)
        Called when the transfer status has been changed.
        Parameters:
        state - The rough transfer state Task.State.
        detailedState - The detailed transfer state Task.DetailedState.
        obj - Additional information according to the transfer status.
        You must cast to valid types for each cases.
        String when Task.DetailedState.PREPARING_UPDATED_KEY
        Task.FileState[] when Task.DetailedState.PREPARING_UPDATED_FILE_LIST
        Task.FileState when Task.DetailedState.TRANSFERRING
